name: Sim Brick
overview: This definitely lampoons SimAnt by Maxis from 1992. There is only one action option for the player: Clicking "Exist" summons a brick which crushes the ant below it. "Stats" shows a humorously useless screen with the dimensions of the brick and a few bits of information. Released on Amiga Power issue 13 (May 1992) disk 12B.
